name: Pixel Cat Games - Toy for Cat
name_original: Pixel Cat Games - Toy for Cat
description:
This is an APK file of an ad free version of Pixel Cat Games to download and install onto your Android Devices.

Is your cat a true gamer?

A simple app to entertain your cats! (or dogs?)

Features

Under the games page there are six toys to choose from, toggle the settings to your liking and set it for your cat to play.

The capture setting captures a photo of your cat when they've successfully caught something.

Hunt Mode allows you to set a goal for your cat and reward them or stop playing once they hit it. Photos are saved into the folder "Pixel Cat Games".

Tap on the X button on the top right to close the game.

Do ensure that you have a screen protector to prevent scratches on your phone/tablet screen.
